content: When the user click on "more topics" in a stream and then scroll down, they will need to scroll up if they want to filter topics or go back to streams. It looks like that we can make these things sticky to the top so that they will always have access to it.
Yep, that's Make top elements sticky in "more topics" view #22911. It would be great if someone could pick this up!

I've been noticing this too. I think moving it to sticky is probably the best fix, but I also suspect we have a regression in the logic we have for choosing the scroll position when clicking on a topic that doesn't account for that row properly somehow, possibly related to one of the experiments we're running.
@Aman (amanagr) FYI, since you're tagged on the issue.
